```{r}
crs.laea <- CRS("+proj=laea +lat_0=52 +lon_0=10 +x_0=4321000 +y_0=3210000 +ellps=GRS80 +units=m +no_defs")  # Lambert Azimuthal Equal Area
locs.laea <- spTransform(locs, crs.laea)  # spTransform makes the projection
```
